page.title: 16SPORT AND RECREATION
page.content: There is a small{greyhound stadium}in our area with meetings once a fortnight. On the day of a race a greyhound does not eat.At the stadium the dog is weighed and put into a kennel. Just before the race the dog is paraded in front of the people. It is given a muzzle and a race jacket. The dog is put into the traps. When the hare comes round the race starts. After the race the dog is given a drink and has its paws checked. The{cricket club}is in Fenwick. They play friendly matches with people from all around Fenwick. The cows graze in the cricket field when there is no match. The cows can not go where the wickets are. There is a{lake}near the brickworks. There are some wooden huts for the{fishing club}to use for competitons. They catch all types of freshwater fish.
